text: Kaadu sinam Yallal taamineeh sinni Rabbil dambi cabti esseraanamak ken waassem matan, Yallih xaquk Nabii Mucammad JcsakeiÄ·e Qhuraan luk keenih yemeete waqdi, naharsi mara finqak geyteemiy usun essereeni keenih tamaate tet akke waytek, hinnay digaalay usun intih abaluk keenit tamaate Qambaalan ken akke waytek
